refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: SecondaryIE identifies a secondary word or words in an IndexEntry.
In IndexEntrys, you can specify as many secondary terms that are necessary. Secondary and tertiary terms can be mixed, following the primary.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: SecondaryIEs occur below the PrimaryIE, usually aligned with each other and indented from the primary.
